About Me

Hello and thank you for visiting my website! I am Sam Hoidal. I am a software developer, business enthusiast, and passionate adventurer.


I love solving problems via technology. Whether developing an intuitive and engaging frontend experience or solving complex architectural problems on the backend, I am constantly seeking ways to improve the world around us through scalable innovation.


Formerly a financial advisor, I have always thrived in collaborative and fast-paced work environments. I was extremely fortunate to work for disruptive and technology-driven companies in an outdated industry. After years of being more interested in the technology than advising, I started to teach myself to code and was hooked. In November 2019, I made the scary decision to leave my former career and attend a coding bootcamp. Best decision I ever made.


I grew up across the United States, but Colorado is “home”. While attending the University of Wisconsin, I was a member of the varsity rowing team as well as the US National Team and was fortunate to have competed at the highest levels domestically and abroad. When I am not working, I love to seek out learning experiences through adventure and challenge. This endless passion for exploration has led me to backpack South America, climb massive glaciated peaks in Alaska and the Pacific Northwest, rock climbing beautiful peaks all over the country, and volunteering my weekends to ski patrol in the Rockies. You will frequently find me with a camera trying to capture the beauty of these experiences, some of which can be found below.


I look forward to connecting!

Resume

I Specialize In

UX/UI Design

In an increasingly crowded space, developing intuitive, interactive, and elegant user interfaces is more important than ever. I approach design as a cross functional process that includes market research, prototyping, and implementation, with a focus on the end user's wants and needs.

Software Development

I strive to develop scalable, enterprise-class software products. Whether developing interactive and efficient frontends or solving complex architectural problems on the backend, I strive to apply best practices while ensuring usability, readability, and scalability in my code. I believe strongly in an iterative, agile approach and am constantly looking for ways to improve upon, build upon, and test code.

Interaction

I believe that soft skills are equally important as technical skills. From understanding business needs to effective collaboration, I look for opportunities to increase productivity beyond the engineering. It is always easier to work on a project that you understand, that you believe in, and that you have built with great people.
